comments.content: It's not enough to speak language of you own country, if you want to exchange your ideas with foreign people you should learn English!

I have been studied English since 2000 for over 15y......Though speaking in English still seems to be one of the toughest problems for meXD.Anyway ,in my opinions,learning a foreigh language really benefits us a lot not only beacuse the opportunities where we may have but also inspiring people with a new ways of thinking. SO it is worthwhile learning English despite that is not easy
for us whose mother tongue is Chinese.

first.content: I agree. Being able to communicate effectively opens doors that we never even knew existed. It's powerful.
first.name: Hansolo

comments.content: And then you discovered 4chan and start to wonder if Jesus' sacrifice is really worth it.
